name: Where are my batteries?
description:
Help the little Lampy to collect batteries so he can continue emitting his light. But be careful, the game will send you bad batteries, use the light of Lampy to know if it is a real battery, even if it is obsolete (it can be used) or see if it is only a metal stroke that will hurt you.

CONTROLS:

  • A-D: To move Lampy horizontaly.
  • W: To jump.
  • Mouse: To guide the Lampy's light.

A game created for the Community Game Jam, by Erick1310.
